title: My City
description: Mark talks about the city where he lives.
speaker: Mark
text: Today, I want to talk about my city.
I live in a big city.
My city is busy and beautiful.
There are many streets and buildings.
There are shops, schools, and hospitals.
People in my city are friendly.
In my city, there are parks and cafés.
I like to walk in the park.
I love my city very much.

questions.q: What places are in the city?
What does Mark like to do?
